role.name: WebUser
role.descr: A user in this role is allowed to use this web interface.

role.name: WebAdmin
role.descr: This role is used to allow access to AET and User management.

role.name: DatacareUser
role.descr: A user in this role has Datacare rights (edit/merge/delete) in the web interface.

role.name: McmUser
role.descr: This role is used to allow access to the Media Creation Console (Offline Storage).

role.name: JBossAdmin
role.descr: This role is used to allow configuration access via JMX console.

role.name: AuditLogUser
role.descr: Members of this role are allowed to access the Audit Repository.
